activities: Medical product sales and clinical investigations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All clinical trial data are covered by our privacy policy in the same way as it would under U.S. law and regulations.  This is true of all data, including manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
